content.p: Chair (elected by the MEC for a three year term): Dr Adrian Spencer (Loughborough University) Vice-Chair: Not more than three members nominated by each of the East Midlands Universities: De Montfort: Leicester: Lincoln: Loughborough: Nottingham: Nottingham Trent: Northampton: Representative of East Midlands RFCA: Commanding Officers of EMUOTC and EMUAS: OTC: UAS: Defence Academy, DTU representative: Navy Representative: Secretary: (membership to be updated) Return to Committees list Trent Building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 115 951 5761 fax: +44 115 951 5739 email: registrars@nottingham.ac.uk
